test_profiles.actual_query: I've been in retail management for 8 years and want to move into corporate sales. What are my best options?

LinkedIn Summary: Retail Store Manager at Target with 8 years of experience managing teams of 25+ employees. Consistently exceeded sales targets by 15-20% annually. Expert in customer relationship management, inventory optimization, and team performance coaching. Led store-wide initiatives resulting in $2M+ annual revenue. Skilled in POS systems, Salesforce CRM, and data-driven decision making. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration.

Key Achievements:
- Increased store revenue from $8M to $12M over 3 years
- Reduced employee turnover by 35% through training programs
- Implemented customer loyalty program with 40% adoption rate
- Managed budgets up to $500K annually
- Trained and developed 15 assistant managers

Skills: Team Leadership, Sales Strategy, Customer Service Excellence, Conflict Resolution, Budget Management, Visual Merchandising, Staff Training & Development, Performance Analytics, Inventory Control, Negotiation, Time Management

- Expert in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)

- Client Management: Worked directly with 50+ clients
- Project Management: Juggled 10-15 projects simultaneously

Technical:

- Figma: Limited experience (used for 2 projects)

Gaps Identified:

- Limited prototyping and wireframing
- No experience with usability testing
- Minimal understanding of information architecture
- No knowledge of interaction design principles

Education: B.F.A. Graphic Design
Portfolio: www.kevintrandesigns.com (primarily print and branding work)

- Risk Management: Identified and mitigated project risks, safety compliance
- Stakeholder Communication: Regular updates to clients, investors, regulatory bodies
- Contract Negotiation: Negotiated with vendors, subcontractors, suppliers
- Quality Control: Ensured all work met building codes and specifications

- CAD/Design Review: AutoCAD, Revit (reading blueprints)

Leadership:
- Managed project teams of 10-15 direct reports
- Mentored 5 junior project managers
- Conflict resolution between trades and stakeholders
- Performance reviews and team development

Education: B.S. Civil Engineering
Certifications: Project Management Professional (PMP), LEED Green Associate

Transferable Skills:
- Agile-like approach to iterative construction phases
- Strong understanding of dependencies and resource constraints
- Experience with SaaS tools for project collaboration
- Data-driven decision making using project metrics

- Medical Equipment: Ventilators, IV pumps, monitoring systems

- Regulatory Compliance: Joint Commission standards, HIPAA

Soft Skills:

- Detail-oriented with focus on accuracy

Education: B.S.N. Nursing, GPA 3.6
Certifications: RN License (active), BLS, ACLS, CCRN (Critical Care Registered Nurse)
